text: Ojo nadidaand, durūƣşumorandagoni rūzi qijomat, ki haroina, Mo oʙro ʙa zamini xuşku ʙegijoh ravona mesozem, to kiştzorho ʙirūjonem corpojonaşon va xudaşon az on ʙixūrand? Ojo in ne'mathoro ʙo caşmoni xud nameʙinand? Pas ʙidonand, ki Alloh taolo in guna cizhoero, ki padid ovard, alʙatta, ʙar zinda gardondani murdaho qodir ast
